content: this one skein shawl has a simple bold shape which is designed to show off a special skein of variegated yarn it is worked end to end which allows you to use up as much of the skein as possible the long narrow shape means that this piece is a perfect transitional accessory for spring or autumn but also light enough to be worn on a cooler summer day it is a simple make and a great shawl pattern for a beginner the shawl can be made with around 100g of any fingering weight yarn with a similar length and fibre composition to the recommended yarn to ensure good drape
